title: Peer Teaching and Formative Assessment Strategies Using Web Feeds in E-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in using basic online learning platforms (e.g., Blackboard) and understanding of social media feed concepts
context.additional_context: Learners are working professionals or civically experienced adults with frequent difficulties attending real-time classes; flexible learning via personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can collect and categorize peer learning materials in real-time using web feeds (e.g., RSS).
Learners can provide feedback at least three times based on peer assessment rubrics and compose constructive comments.
Learners can automate updates to their personal learning portfolios by integrating LMS with web feed technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
